itunes:title: Episode 287 - The Last Travis Pastrana Interview... Maybe?
title: Episode 287 - The Last Travis Pastrana Interview... Maybe?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor sit down with action sports superstar Travis Pastrana hours before he attempts to recreate all 3 of Evel Knievel's most iconic jumps LIVE on the History Channel tonight at 8pm EST! Will this be his last interview? We hope...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor sit down with action sports superstar Travis Pastrana hours before he attempts to recreate all 3 of Evel Knievel's most iconic jumps LIVE on the History Channel tonight at 8pm EST! Will this be his last interview? We hope not.
